name: The haunted hospice
description:
The Haunted Hospice.

You went with your friends to explore an island that has been deserted for a long time. There are several stories that strange things are still happening there on the island. Unfortunately things do not end well you lose one of your friends after he went back to get them forgotten things. Of course, you went back to look for your friend. after a time of searching, you yourself are trapped and you too are locked in the hospital.

So you are in a lot of trouble, you lost a your friend and you yourself are now trapped.
You soon realize that you are locked in the hospital and certainly not alone. Almost every door you try to open is locked. Try different ways to open the doors and escape from the hospital.

By using the hidden objects that you have found throughout the hospital, you must try to escape. You can combine different objects in order to advance. There are many hidden rooms, dark corridors and different opponents which makes your escape no easier.

Find special items such as a UV lamp to unlock the secrets of the hospital and a magnetic fish set to retrieve lost items from the water.

Throughout the hospital there are 60 collectible items to complete your game at 100%.

Will you manage to find your friend and escape from the hospital? Prove it!
